mean_cn: n.轮廓，等高线，概要；  vt.画轮廓，画等高线
mean_en: the outer edges of something; the outline of its shape or form; (also contour line) a line on a map that joins points that are the same height above sea level
sentence: The contour lines join points of equal height.
sentence_trans: 等高线上的点距离地面的高度相等。
word_etyma: con全部 + tour旋转，迂回 → 全部转一圈 → contour轮廓
